leads.lead_text: Procumbent herb; stem prostrate, pubescent-canescent, usually not purplish; leaves hispid-canescent on both surfaces
Decumbent herb; stem erect or suberect, glabrous, lustrous and purplish; leaves glabrous adaxially, puberulous on veins below
